name: One Engine Left
description:
If HTML-version is struggling, try the zipped EXE file at the link below!

Made for the 2019 GMTK Game Jam. Event Theme: ONLY ONE

When one engine burns out, you can only turn in one direction for your one chance at landing this world war one biplane with one unlucky pilot.

PUT A SCREENSHOT OF YOUR HIGH SCORE IN THE SUBMISSION COMMENTS :)

Download the .exe version here

Controls:
W/Up - Throttle Up
S/Down - Throttle Down
A/Left - Yaw Left
D/Right - Trim Straight
